tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was very clear in explaining about the heart related questions. He was very friendly. The staffs were good in coordinating the patients with all the procedure involved. They were very polite and time management was effectively followed. The clinic is well maintained and additional benefit is they have all the equipments needed that is required to heart related tests. The treatment process is very clear and effective. Overall it was a great experience. We will definitely recommend Dr.Ajeet .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting, Echo (pediatric & adult) ,Cardiac checkup - General,
review: Visited first time for routine checkup after 8 years of my CABG surgery. Wanted to take ECG and ECHO. Could not go to any lab due to this Covid pandemic. Heard about this doctor and  gone to his clinic to undergo those tests. After under going the tests doctor explained clearly all the precautions to be taken care. He has also reduced the medicines I have been taking for the last 8 years saying such powerful medicine are nit necessary. The conversation with doctor and his friendlyness is motivating and given me more confidence. I recommended this doctor for any cardiac related consultancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Before visiting Dr Ajeet,I was taken to SRM Potheri to seek treatment for my restlessness,sleeplessness & depression there they adviced immediate Angio to locate blocks,but we managed to visit this Dr at Frontier Life Hospital accidentally on a subsequent day as I had preexposure as an interventional Cardiologist to seek his opinion bef.undergoing both knees replacements at MIOT hospital.Dr studied my case with all parience and investigation assistance then he propsed treatment regimens without venturing Angio etc. that means he take all possibilities to ruleout  sudden unwanted surgery protogals  still saving me from all the ordeals.Thus I am continuing Dr Ajeet's cunsultation since 2010.Onemore thing he use to balance with the prescription of other physicions for other ailments like neurological treatment with Dr Velmurugendran in my case.So we are fully satisfied with his diagnosis,treatment,patience in handling the needy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
It's a fabulous experience,.
Till before meeting the wonderful Doctor, I was loaded with tension, confusion and panic, but once I happen to meet him, hope, peace and comforting replaced the earlier evil elements and soothes me,. 
Now I am under medication and waiting to meet the doctor to have more such fabulous experience,.
Thank God for your guidance to reach this wonderful Doctor,.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:

By his approach itself we feel comfortable.
We have hope and confidence over him is so strong.
I am happy have a such great doctor take care of me.
Thank you sir üôè

review: The doctor was very friendly and explained the problem with good animated pictures. Advised to take ECG and ECHO and explained the graph too. Also advised to get an own BP meter and check BP regularly to see the improvement and also said what  should be done in future to avoid it...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor has always been the friendly person I've known for the past 3 years of being his patient. He goes through all reports & advises the treatment to be taken. Also keen to know how one feels & suggests the diet to be followed and the exercise to be done to keep healthy. He Has alot of patience & is not in a hurry to dispose of the patient. I am very much comfortable sharing my health problems with Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
"Clinic Neatness is the face of Professionalism", which I could see there first.
They have a connected system across Dr. Ajeet, main cardiac specialist with other teams such as Consultation team (problem understanding and food recommendation), Diagnostic Team,   etc. through their software which gives advantage and also easily accessable for information and hence faster way to complete our checkup.

Moreover, the team is good in taking care of you showing the respect and hospitality.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A very friendly doctor. Patient is explained with the issues and how to overcome the same. Advises care to be taken and suggests healthy dieting habits. Never gets annoyed on repititive enquiry by patient of his / her problems. No overdose of medicine and prescribes adequate strength and quantity. He is now our Family physician for all Cardiac ailments. Clinic is fully equipped with latest equipment for immediate and quick diagnosis of Cardiac issues. I Recommend for all Cardiac patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Very friendly Doctor and the staff, they are so good in what they are doing. They are explaing the patient conditon clearly, diagnosis and the precautions to be taken very patiently. I have never seen anywhere that preparing a PPT and explaing the patient on the diagnosis and precautions. explaining each tablet given and its uses!

Highly Recomended!!!!

By God's Grace I happen to have time with this wonderful, amazing Doctor,.
When I met him I was literally very week and was always feeling very lazy and always was feeling very much tired,.
Now with his treatment and by The Grace of The Almighty God I feeling very good and become very active and energetic. It's really a comeback to a very normal life,.
I always be Thankful to The Almighty God and to this wonderful Doctor Ajeeth Sir,.
I keep recommending all of my friends and well wishers to have a consultation with his amazing Doctor for any of the cardiac issues for a real come back,.
